name: Baroque Works
text: Main: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 (Baroque Works) type card other than [Baroque Works] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 (Baroque Works) type card other than [Baroque Works] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
